Body:
I want to get the appClient.log.setLevel('info') log information into JSON format. It currently only prints to the console and I want to be able to send it to the front end.

I am using Node.js, Express, ibmiotf npm package, JavaScript

I am able to get a device status message with

appClient.subscribeToDeviceStatus('Monitor_Dev');	appClient.on(deviceStatus"
column12:
topic) { console.log("Device status from :: "+deviceType+" : "+deviceId+" with payload : "+payload); }

I want the information logged to the console with

appClient.log.setLevel('info')

which returns 

[ApplicationClient:connnect] ApplicationClient Connected

Does anyone know how to get this info in JSON format?

I have tried console.logging the whole statement and storing it into a variable
column13:
but that doesn't seem to work.

"
